title: Bramble Crate
info: The Bramble Crate is a Hardmode crate that can only be fished in the Jungle. Bramble Crates contain items found in standard crates, and they always contain an item normally found in Ivy Chests within Jungle Shrines. Its pre-Hardmode counterpart is the Jungle Crate.
